ComicInfo.Title: Rage of Angels
ComicInfo.Writer: Rob Liefeld,Robert Place Napton,Robert Napton,Rob Liefeld,Robert Napton
ComicInfo.Summary: Rage of Angels: Starting just after Violator/Badrock, this sees the first meeting of Angela and Glory, as they fight to stop the reborn Celestine take over Amazonia.
